name: Racer (itch) (Russian Gamedevelopment Community)
description:
Racer is puzzle game for Sega Mega Drive / Sega Genesis consoles. Release date: 2007-2013.
It looks like some racing thing. Enter and turn the key. Now you have to drive through the virtual map on the screen, although nothing changes. So simply hit the directions as follows: right or left. Good luck!

Develops attention, cognitive processes, and imagination.

Features:
- 8 stages;
- 2 music tracks;
- SFX.

BUY cartridge on eBay
